projects.title: Gamer's Paradise
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. It's an eCommerce website for selling games online. Made with Python, Django and JavaScript. Hosted with PythonAnyWhere.
